Module.Content:
<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01//EN"
  "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/strict.dtd">
<html>
<body>

<script>
function compose() {
  var eventData = {
    details: 'You can see my Wisghlist in Birthday+ gadget',

 

    // Note that attendees MUST be sent in contact format.
    attendees: [
      {email: 'event@testrpcplus.appspotmail.com'}
    ]


  };
  google.calendar.composeEvent(eventData);
}
</script>

<center>
<button onclick="compose()">Compose Event</button>
</center>

</body>
</html>
